title: ep1_morning
body:
Mundane Beginnings
<<BlackScreen>><<cicada>>
<<kasPos3>>
<<nar>>The hum of the locust, like the fizzing of air.
Like pop bubbling out of glass bottles. 
It meant the dust of winter had begun to fall off the face of the Earth and new fruits would bloom from the branches.
<<bedroomMorning>>Kasmiera opens her eyes. 
The world brightens around her as she crawls out of bed. 
Bright beams rip through the curtains leaving puddles of light across the wooden floor. 
Another cool morning in Moorbear Village. 

<<bathroomMorning>>

She slinks into the bathroom, preparing herself for the day. 
She washes the weary night out of her hair,
Brushes her teeth,  and pulls her school uniform on.
A little gloss across her lips, a dash of blush across the cheeks and some highlighter on the eyelids. 

Cg of the mirror with Kasmiera in it

<<name Kasmiera>>“All done!”

<<nar>>She bounces towards the door before bolting back to the mirror. 

<<name Kasmiera>>“All done!”“I almost forgot.”

<<nar>>She opens the mirror cabinet and pulls pucks to pills form some tiny bowls. 
She tosses them into her mouth, shallows and walks of of the bathroom. 

<<kitchenMorning>>

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“All done!”“Mmmmm!”
“Something smells good!”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“All done!”“Course it does. I'm cooking ain't I?”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“All done!”“What's on the menu?”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“Eggs, bacon, potato waffles, pancakes, sandwiches-”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Woah, woah, woah!”
“How am I supposed to eat all that before school?”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“I'm sure you'll figure it out.”
“By the way, you did take your medication before coming down here, right?

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Yah, yah, don't have to remind me.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“You can be forgetful sometimes.”
“Wouldn't want to wake up covered in hair from head to toe, would you?”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Ew!” 
“If that ever happens just put me in the zoo with the rest of the yeti.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“I'll visit every day.”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Look at the time!”
“I've gotta go or I'll be late!”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“But you haven't eaten breakfast?” 

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“This'll do.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>*sigh*
“And hour spent cooking and you go for the toast.”
“No one warns you about these things before you become a parent.”
“And do you have to use your hands!”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>‘I'm looking for something.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“Those cards of yours, huh?”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Yup, and I'm feeling lucky today.”
“A what?”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“What is it?”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Another Fairy Dragon Knight.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“Aren't those good?”
“Last time you got one you were pretty sided.”

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“Yah, but I already have two and that's the most you can play in one game.”
“I wanted a Mermaid Witch instead.”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“Well there's always next time.” 

<<cam1>><<name Kasmiera>>“I guess.”
“Seeya!”

<<cam2>><<name Dad>>“Take care.”

<<busMorning>>

<<nar>>Moorbear. 
A little town in rural Vale.
Home to nothing but the few residents that inhabit this small slice of the world. 
So insignificant no one would think to mention it for anything. 
Kasmiera sighs.
The bus was seldom full.
She'd never seen more that a handful of people in there.
A good thing of course.
But there was a part of her that reminisced over the bustle of city life.
The spralling skyscrapers that barreled ever High towards the sun. 
The glass cages of malls with the latest fashions. 
Here she had to wait a whole month to have something delivered. 

...
<<schoolGateMorning>> 

<<name Shadae>>"Hey wait!"

<<name Kasmiera>>"What is it?"

<<name Shadae>>"You’re late."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Really?"
"That can’t be right."
"It’s eight thirty. I’m right on time. "

<<name Shadae>>"Actually you’re twelve seconds late."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Twelve!?"

<<name Shadae>>"Yup. Fifteen now."

<<name Kasmiera>>"You’re joking right?"
"Twelve seconds is nothing!"
"I’ve seen Lisa let people in without a slip for way more than twelve seconds."

<<name Shadae>>"Well firstly, it’s not twelve anymore. It’s thirty nine."

<<name Kasmiera>>"What!"

<<name Shadae>>"And secondly, I’m not Lisa Conroy. "
"I actually care about the rules. "
"That’s why I was appointed to the gate."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Just my luck."
"Wait…."
"Is that a…"
"FairyFighter Card!"

<<name Shadae>>"Yes, what of it?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"I’m a collector too!"
"Got fifty-three of em’."
"Fifty-four actually since this morning."
"I just so happen to have snagged another Dragon Fairy Knight."

<<name Shadae>>"Another!"
"You already have one of those!?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Nope."
"I had two before."
"Three now."
"Though, I don’t really need another one of these."
"One’s enough, two’s being greedy but three is just too much, yah know."

<<name Shadae>>"I bet."
"I don’t even have one."
"My parents only let me get the cards that come with Fairyflakes. "
"I've been eating that sugary goop for weeks just hoping a Dragon Fairy Knight shows up."
"Yuck."

<<name Kasmiera>>"I could give it to you."
"If you…"
"You know?"

<<name Shadae>>"I know what?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"If you…let me off just this once."
"If you do, I swear I’ll never be late again."
"Heck, I’ll be here at the crack of dawn if that’s what you want."
"I just can’t have detention today."
"I have a thing later today."

<<name Shadae>>"…"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Please?"

<<name Shadae>>"Well…"
"When you pit it that…"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Yes?"

<<name Shadae>>"I'll have to give you another detention for tomorrow."

<<name Kasmiera>>"What!!!"

<<name Shadae>>"For trying to bribe a hall monitor."
"Well gate monitor actually. "
"We don't yet have an official title for this role."

<<name Kasmiera>>"How about pig?"

<<name Shadae>>"What?!"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Nothing."
"I'll take my tickets and head off to class now, officer. "

<<name Shadae>>"Hmm, officer does have a nice ring to it. "
"Here you go, um…."
"Kasmiera Odele."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Right."
"Well don't be late next time, alright. "

<<name Shadae>>"I'll try."


<<hallMorning>>

<<name Kasmiera>>"Connor! "
"Hey!"
"Guess what I got!"

<<name Connor>>"Another Fairy Dragon Knight!"
"Okay, who are you colluding with?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"No one."
"The universe just has a little crush on me."

<<name Connor>>"Too bad it's not Thomas Reece."

<<name Kasmiera>>"He'll come around eventually. "

<<name Connor>>"He'll have to, since you're never gonna ever ask him out. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Well, it would be really boyish if I did. "
"And I heard some girls talking about how Thomas likes really girlie girls. "
"Asking him is like the number one way of getting turned down by him. "

<<name Connor>>"Well I for one think that's silly. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Of course you do, you think everything that has to do with girls is silly. "
"And even half the stuff that has to do with boys. "
"You ought to be studied for whatever's wrong with you. "

<<name Connor>>"Well if I have to go to some kook house, you're coming with me. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"I mean, as an escort maybe. "
"And I'll visit once a week too. "
"Twice if your handler’s cute. "

<<name Connor>>"You’re lucky you're good at Magic Clash."
"I'd have dumped your ass by now if not for that."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Oh! "
"Speaking of."
"I can't play with you guys today."

<<name Connor>>"What!"
"Why?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"I got detention. "

<<name Connor>>"No."
"You?"
"Finally snapped, huh?"
"What did you do?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"That's the sad thing. "
"I barely did anything. "
"I was a little late for school, by like thirty seconds or something and there was this new gate person. "

<<name Connor>>"Shadae?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"How’d you know?"

<<name Connor>>"I’ve met her a couple of times."
"Real 'stick up the ass' kinda girl. "
"Gave me a detention slip cos she caught me chewing gum in the hallway. "
"Like what?"
"It's not like I'm leaving it under desks. "
"It was in my mouth? "
"She’s just the worst. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Yah, and unfortunately she got me too."

<<name Connor>>"Well, just skip it."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Huh?"

<<name Connor>>"Skip detention and hang out with me and the guys after class. "
"It's not like you’ll get into that much trouble. What's one more detention?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Tempting as that sounds, I don’t even want the one I've got. Well two. "

<<name Connor>>"You got two detention!"
"Don't tell me you slapped her something."

<<name Kasmiera>>"What!"
"No!"
"I just tried to give her one of my cards and she took it the wrong way. "
"And I don't wanna get a reputation, yah know. "
"I'm trying to fly under the radar."

<<name Connor>>"Seeing as how you’re the second tallest girl in class I feel like you’d have to crouch in order to fly under anything."

<<name Kasmiera>>"Har har."
"Seriously though, I'm not looking to get a reputation."
"And getting three detentions in one week would definitely be a start. "
"I just wanna be on the borderline of exceptional. "
"The sorta student that graduates but doesn't have to give a whole speech at the end of the year."

<<name Connor>>"So, like average?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"I guess so. "

<<name Connor>>"That's so boring. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Well, you’d think that. "
"You’re basically a delinquent at this point. "
"On your way to being a straight up felon, even."

<<name Connor>>"What?"
"I’m good. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Really?"

<<name Connor>>"Well, I'm decent. "
"I haven't gone to detention in like two weeks. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Haven't been written up or haven't physically gone?"

<<name Connor>>"Hmm."
"I guess those two things are kinda different. "
"But the gum thing isn't worth two hours of my life. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Just be careful. "
"I don't want you getting expelled and transferred to a different school. "

<<name Connor>>"Oh, cos you’ll miss me?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Cos you’re surprisingly good at math. "

<<name Connor>>"Yah, yah, I know you'll miss me so I won't be going anywhere."
"Afterall, I'm pretty much just on the borderline of being a delinquent. "
"I'm not like Carl or Fred or "

<<name Fred>>"DINA!!"

<<nar>>Suddenly a scream is heard through the hall.

<<name Fred>>"Don't walk away from me!"

<<name Nadine>>"Why shouldn't I? "

<<name Fred>>"You owe my friend twenty quid. "

<<name Nadine>>"What are you? His lawyer?"

<<name Fred>>"Nah, I'm the repo man, and I ain't afraid of hitting a girl. "

<<name Nadine>>"Who said Imma girl? "

<<name Fred>>"You punch like one."
"Saw you and Fred last week. "
"The only reason you beat him was cos he got injured during practice. "

<<name Nadine>>"Oh, that's what that was?"
"I just thought he was pussy."
"But if he was really that messed up I don't mind a rematch. "
"Where is he anyway?"
"It's his money after all?"
"And his tooth. "

<<name Fred>>"You're done for."
"Courtyard. "
"Second break. "
"I'll give you a real fight. "

<<name Nadine>>"Sure."
"Just don't blame it on a bad leg when I kick your ass. "

<<nar>>The argument becomes less and less audible as the pair part ways and crowds of students begin to fill the corridor. 

<<name Connor>>"Woah, that was something. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Yah, chaos. "
"And over twenty quid. "

<<name Connor>>"Damn, rich girl? "
"We get it. "
"You got money. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"That's not what I meant. "
"I just don't think that sorta money’s worth suspension, or a broken nose, or a lost tooth."
"Especially a lost tooth. "
"And in the front row too."
"I’d just die!"

<<name Connor>>"You really are a girl, aren't you?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"Don't say it like it's a surprise. "

<<name Connor>>"It's not about the money."
"It's about respect. "
"Dino took something from Fred’s gang so they gotta make sure nobody gets the wrong idea. "
"You know, think the Westbridge boys have gone soft or something. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Yikes."
"Remind me to never bump into those guys."

<<name Connor>>"Sure, but before I do that-"
"Do you wanna go watch the fight?"

<<name Kasmiera>>"What? Why would I wanna do that?"

<<name Connor>>"You know, to see if Fred gets his tooth knocked out too."

<<name Kasmiera>>"I doubt it. Have you seen him?"
"He’s a giant. "
"And coming from me that's saying something. "

<<name Connor>>"Yah, but you’ve never seen Dino fight. "
"She’s pretty good with her fists."
"It's a pretty even match of you ask me. "

<<name Kasmiera>>"Either way, I'm not really interested in that sort of thing."
"I hate fights. "
"I'd probably just be anxious the whole time."

<<name Connor>>"Suit yourself, see you later!"



At Detention

“So it's the two of us?”

“Seems that way.” 

“Guess I get started on my homework.”


“Well, well, well. Shadae.”

“Nadine.”

“It's Dino.”

“That's a dog's name.”

“It's a better name than Shadae.”

“Look, why don't you just sit down and read a book, or do your homework.”

“And where’s the fun in that?”

“Detention’s not supposed to be fun. It's supposed to be a deterrent.”

“What-”

“Deterrent means-” 

“The fuck is your problem?”

“No swearing!” 
“Don't make me have to write you up.”

“I’m just curious, are you like some abused child that gets off on being a control freak cos you don't get to have opinions at home,”
“Or are you just authentically this grating?”

“I’m considering giving you another detention actually.”
“But the idea of seeing you everyday is the only thing keeping me from doing that.”

“It’s not like I'd show up anyway.”

“Then why bother coming in today?”
“Finally grew a conscience?”

“I just don't wanna get expelled.”

“Typical.”
“Always on the verge of expulsion yet you won't give the school the relief of your absence.” 

“You talk like the only thing you’ve ever kissed in your life is a thesaurus.”

“Just sit down and stop bothering me.”

“Whatever.”

“Hey.”

“Oh, hi.” 

“Haven't seen you around here before.”
“Usually it's me and Jerry, or me, Jerry and Mia or Me and Mia, or me and Thomas.”
“You're not a regular though, are you?”

“Nope.”

“Well don't make me pry it outta ya!”
“Whatcha do?”

“Um, I was late.”

“Really?”
“That's it?”

“Yah, nothing all that impressive I'm afraid.”

“Yah know you're in Mia's seat right?”
“Yah know what she did to get that seat?”
“She pinched one hundred thirty-two quid from Sister Martha's purse.”
“Woulda got away with it too if Micky hadn't ratted her out.”
“You know Micky, right?”

“Um no.”

“Year 12, stupid glasses, got a bit of his ear missing.”

“Yah..”
“She didn't…”

“She keeps the little chunk of it in the locket round her neck.”
“She's here every Friday too.”
“Has to do some bullshit assignments for months as punishment.”

“Oh, that sounds terrible.”

“Oh and one more thing.” 
“She doesn't like it when people sit in her seat.”
“She has a real six sense for that stuff too.”
“You think she couldn't know that sorta stuff but she does.”
“She just has a sense about who's been in that seat.”

“R-really?”

“Mhmm.”
“But yah, that's all I really gotta say about Mia.” 
“Just a warning, cutie.”

“O-okay…”

Kasmiera starts shuffling herself to another seat.

“Really?”
“You seriously aren't buying that poppycock, are you?” 

“Jesus, just say ‘bullshit’ like a normal teenager.” 

“If a student really did maim another student, the wouldn't just be allowed to roam the hallways.”
“They’d be expelled. Obviously.”

“Mia’s gotta lot of ties around this town.”
“Someone coulda pulled a few strings for all we know.”

“Also, I’m pretty sure Micky lost that chunk of his ear in a fishing accident.”
“Debra told me.”

“Debra’s a liar and idiot.”

“Okay, well Debra also knows everything about everyone plus her dad’s a doctor.”

“So?”

“So he probably told her about stitching Micky’s ear up or something.”
“I’m gonna have to defer to Occam’s Razor.”

“Who-”

“Occam’s Razor is a-”

“Cares what you think.”
“I know what the truth is cos I got it from the source.”
“Mia herself.”

“Well technically Micky’s the source cos it’s his ear chunk that’s missing.”

“Yah, but Mia has it!”

“Allegedly.”


Kasmiera stands up.

“Hey!”
“Sit down!”

“Huh?”

“You're seriously not moving cos of some tall-tale, are you?”

“I mean, lie or not, which it isn't by the way, have you seen Mia?”
“Tall, big, and I heard she went to juvie for stabbing someone.”
“She's not the kinda girl you wanna mess with.”



“I fell asleep.”

“Yup.” 
“Slept through your first detention.”

“Oh sorry about that.”

“It's fine.”
“Better than the constant pestering of Nadine.”
“Looking at her sleeping like that it almost makes me forget how annoying she is awake.”

“Should I wake her up?”

“Sigh.”
“I guess so considering I can't just lock her in here.”

Kasmiera taps Dino awake. 

“What…”
“What is it.”

“Detentions over.”

“Really?”
“Damn, I thought I could sleep a few minutes longer.”

“You've got a bed back at your place I'm sure. Now let's get moving.”

Hallway

“I hate walking through this hallway.”
“It's so creepy.”

“Yah, I don't get why they don't replace the lights here.”
“The flickering really spooks me out.”

“It's not that bad.”

“Of course you'd think that, seeing as how you're the scariest thing here.”

“Thank you!”
“But if you're really that scared you can always get behind me.”

“And what would you skinny butt do, huh?”

“You know what?”
“Forget I said anything.”
“If ghosts attack I'll just help the quiet one and let them take you.”

“Better that than having to listen to you speak another second.”

“If only I had a Void of Silence card handy.”

“Wait, you play FairyFight too?”

“Yah, with my little brother.”
“He loves that baby crap.”

“Oh.”

“...”
“But I guess it's not a bad game.”
“Especially considering I'm a pretty good duelist.”
“What's your best card?”

“Fairy Dragon Knight.”

“What!”
“You actually have one of those!”

“I've got three actually.”

Kasmiera sticks her hand in her pocket.

“I got another one this morning…”
"It's somewhere in here.”
“Somewhere…”

“Um, you good?”

“I-I can't find it…”

“You seriously lost a Dragon Fairy Knight Card?”

“No it has to be here somewhere!” 
“Maybe it dropped in the classroom.”
“I gotta go back for it!”

“And walk through that creepy hallway again?”
“No way.”

“Please, it's really important.”

“It's just a card game, Kasmiera.”
“After all, if you really left it in the classroom it'll be there tomorrow morning.”

“But what if someone comes in and takes it!”

“Just come in early.”
“That way no one's gonna snag that card before you, alright?”
“Now let's get out of here.”

Swamp corridor

“Why does it feel like this corridor is never ending?”
“It feels like we've been walking for ages.”

“Are we…lost?”

“It's a hallway! How can we be lost?”

“Well it sure seems like we are.”

“Maybe we should turn back.” 
“Retrace our steps.”

“We're walking in a straight line!”
“The stairways gotta close.”

“You know what, you guys keep going nowhere.”
Dino turns around.
“I'm gonna go-”
“back…”

“Well you do whatever you wanna do.”
“It's not like we could stop you anyway.”

“Guys….”
“Turn around.”

“What is it?”

“Just turn around.”

The girls turn around and find they're in a swamp.

“W-what?”

“I'm not hallucinating right?”
“You can see the trees too?”

“Hard to miss.”

“Where are we?”

“Isn't it obvious.”

The girls turn around again and see a frog sitting in front of them.

“Oh, I forgot. Your human eyes are faulty,”
“clouded with falsehoods and wickedness.”
“You need not worry, I will take them out for you.”

Commercial Break 

“You guys are seeing the giant frog man too, right?”

“Yup, clear as day.”

“Oh, don't tremble so. I only desire one thing from you.”

“What do you want?”

“Your lies!”
“Place them before me and you may cross back to the ‘realm of man’ as your kind calls it.”

“What are you talking about?”

“Hmmmm.”
“Must all things be revealed to you?”
“Are your minds so confined?”
“Very well, I will say it plainly.”
“The divine eye of Belial sees two lies given life.”
“It desires them back.”

“I don't understand?”
“What lies?”

“I cannot say!”
“Lies from the lips of liars are sweet as pomegranate seeds”
“but they rot when spoken by witnesses.” 
“But if you will not do me the kindness of returning these lies to me.”

The frog stands on its hind legs.

“I will take them!”
